My setuo keep Stucked on 70% for 4 hours this is normal?

@dudubrigati

You probably exited the Setup.bat, and started it again. Delete everything, extract again, and run Setup.bat. On the other hand, if you have an old hardware, you might just need to wait for the setup to finish.
